author: zhenbinwu
body:
#### PR description:

Major ukpdate of the Phase-2 GMT Emulator:

1. Add the Phase-2 KMTF alogirthm for barrel muon
2. Get the Phase-2 OMTF and EMTF to the Phase-2 Standalone Muon ghost busting algorithm
4. Refined the Tracker Muon matching and quality bits for low pt muon
5. Restructure the TPS code into header and source files.
6. Update the Tracker Muon output to GT, sending quality score and isolation sum
title: Update of the Phase-2 GMT Emulator
